participant_1.background:
I keep secrets from my parents.
I love my morning coffee and my cozy bed.
i have a lot of trophies from my childhood.
my favorite band is the muggers.
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.

participant_2.background:
I like to go hiking in the woods with my brother.
i am studying for my master s.
i can t sing very well.
i own 4 cats.
I love to go shopping online for cute shoes in my size at Zappos.

content.text: What is your favorite activity to do with your brother?
Hi there! We really like to go hiking in the woods.
That sounds like so much fun! I love the outdoors.
It is! We get to spend time together and explore new places.
I would love to do that sometime! Do you have a favorite hike that you have done?
Yes! We went to Yosemite a few years ago and hiked Half Dome. It was really difficult, but so rewarding.
That sounds amazing! I have always wanted to go to Yosemite.
You should definitely go! It is beautiful.
I just might! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go shopping online for shoes.
I love shopping online too! What is your favorite shoe store?
I really like Zappos. They have a huge selection of shoes and they always have great deals.
I love Zappos too! I have ordered a lot of shoes from there.
They are the best! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to write stories. I have been writing for as long as I can remember.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to write a book.
You should totally do it! It is so much fun.
I might just have to! I love to read, so I think I would enjoy writing too.
You would! It is a great way to express yourself.
Thanks for the encouragement! I think I will start writing a book.
That is so great! I can't wait to read it!
Thanks! I will let you know when it is finished.
